Version 1.6.2 - Added also the AppList System Applications Choice (as Requested). - Changes in Preferences Panel. Version 1.6.1
- Added the option to Enable iPad Style Rotation with the Dock at the Bottom.
- Added the option to Enable Large Scrolling Folders when Rotation is Active (Thanks to my Friend @Squ1dd13 for this).
- Added Twitter, My Repo and Donations Icons Labels.
- Small Fixes in Prefs.


Version 1.6
- Added the AppList Support and Dependence: now you can select the Incompatible Applications to block Medusa Rotation.
- Added the option to Disable the Rotation on HomeScreen.
- Added iOS 10 Compatibility to the Rotate the LockScreen's option.
- Now you can add My Repo on Cydia and Donate Me (thanks so much) with the New Labels in Preferences Panel.
- Changes in Labels and Descriptions in Prefs.
- Code improvements (should be quite fine to work also without the Respring, however that's the better way to refresh Prefs).
!Thanks so much for the Nice and really Precious Help to my Dear Friend and Developer Olivier Crespo (@OlyDJios) about the making of this Update!
Version 0.0.1-5
- The SplitView Feature is working again for all Devices after the last Update.
- A little bit of Fixes in Code, thanks a lot to my dear Friend and Developer @orangebananaspy for it.


Version 0.0.1-4
- Changed the Activation of the Tweak in Settings.
- Code Cleaned and Optimized.
- Hopefully Some Bugs Fixed.
- Small Modifications in the Preferences.
Version 0.0.1-3
- Added the option to Rotate the LockScreen (iOS 9 only).
- Changed the way to Rotate the HomeScreen (now in iPad Style with the Dock Rotation and fixed the Icons overlapping issue).
- Added the Extra Section.
- Optimization of the Code.
- Small Changes in Settings.


Version 0.0.1-2
- Added the option to enable/disable the Rotation on the HomeScreen (take enabled both options to have the Rotation still in the Apps).
- Little Changes in the Preferences Panel.
